channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hire AI, Not Humans: Shopify CEO's Radical Mandate Catching VC Attention
item.description: "Reflexive AI usage is now a baseline expectation at Shopify," Lutke declared in his memo to employees.

item.title: Court Rejects UK Attempt To Have Apple Encryption Case Held In Secret
item.description: A U.K. court has ruled that the Home Office can't, as it had hoped, keep a hearing on backdoor access to Apple's encrypted cloud data under wraps.

item.title: AI Education: The Foundation Of Tomorrow's Workforce
item.description: AI literacy will be as essential as reading and math in preparing students for the future.

item.title: The AI Investment Race: U.S. And EU Strategies For Global Leadership
item.description: Stargate aims to cement American dominance through scale and speed, while the EU’s InvestAI focuses on ethical leadership and trust-driven innovation.

item.title: Culture Communication: An Equation, A Word, A Measurement?
item.description: Setting the cultural direction is a critical skill for a CEO. But how do you set that direction?

item.title: This is number 10,000
item.description: Give or take. It’s hard to get the exact count through the sands of time. But it’s at least 10,000 blog posts as of today. That’s 25 years, once or tw...

item.title: An eroding sense of wonder
item.description: We live in a science fiction universe. A $20 dose of penicillin was priceless a century ago. The five cents (a nickel!) we spend to light our home mig...

item.title: Hobby mindset
item.description: You might be fortunate enough to have a hobby. Something you are focused on and passionate about. You might read the journals, develop your skills, co...

item.title: We are all goofballs
item.description: When someone makes an obvious mistake, it’s tempting to label them with a term that’s dismissive or even hurtful. A label is permanent, a noun, a way ...

item.title: We can agree about schismogenesis
item.description: Anthropologist Gregory Bateson highlighted that often, culture is based on oppositional behavior. And it can spiral. They say “up” and the easy thing ...
